The Comstock Lode is a lode of silver ore located under the eastern slope of 
Mount Davidson, a peak in the Virginia Range in Nevada (then western Utah 
Territory). It was the first major discovery of silver ore in the United States. After 
the discovery was made public in 1859, it sparked a silver rush of .... Their 
discovery was actually part of the Comstock Lode, the Old Red Ledge.
